blocks.name: cshwsidrepsw
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number by a number of positions which is not divisible by the prime number results in the word itself, the word is a "repeated symbol word". (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: cshwsidrepswmod0
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number results in the word itself, the shift must be either by 0 (modulo the length of the word) or the word must be a "repeated symbol word". (Contributed by AV, 18-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)
blocks.origin:

} = {
  pm2.61ine(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0, wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0), wo(wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), wceq(c0, co(cfv(c0, nat0), creps, cfv(chash, c0)))))))
  2a1d(wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0), wo(wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), wceq(c0, co(cfv(c0, nat0), creps, cfv(chash, c0)))))

  exp31(wne(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0), wo(wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), wceq(c0, co(cfv(c0, nat0), creps, cfv(chash, c0)))))
  olcd(wa(wa(wne(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz))), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0)), wceq(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), wceq(c0, co(cfv(c0, nat0), creps, cfv(chash, c0))))

  ad2antlr(wne(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0), wa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime)))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz))

  simpll(wne(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0))
  simpr(wa(wne(co(c2, cmo, cfv(chash, c0)), nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cprime), wcel(c2, cz))), wceq(co(c0, ccsh, c2), c0))

thm cshwsidrepswmod0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧(# ` c0)∈ Prime ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[cyclShift]c2)= c0 →((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0 ∨ c0 =((c0 ` 0)[repeatS](# ` c0)))))
} = {
  pm2.61ine((c2[mod](# ` c0)), nat0, ((c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧(# ` c0)∈ Prime ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→((c0[cyclShift]c2)= c0 →((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0 ∨ c0 =((c0 ` 0)[repeatS](# ` c0))))))
  2a1d((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧(# ` c0)∈ Prime ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[cyclShift]c2)= c0, ((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0 ∨ c0 =((c0 ` 0)[repeatS](# ` c0))))
  orc((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0, c0 =((c0 ` 0)[repeatS](# ` c0)))
  exp31((c2[mod](# ` c0))≠ 0, (c0 ∈ Word(c1)∧(# ` c0)∈ Prime ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[cyclShift]c2)= c0, ((c2[mod](# ` c0))= 0 ∨ c0 =((c0 ` 0)[repeatS](# ` c0))))

blocks.name: cshwshashlem1
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number not consisting of identical symbols by at least one position (and not by as many positions as the length of the word), the result will not be the word itself. (Contributed by AV, 19-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Jun-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Nov-2018.)

blocks.name: cshwshashlem2
blocks.content: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number and not of identical symbols by different numbers of positions, the resulting words are different. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-May-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)

  cshwsiun(s1, s0, c0, c1, c2)
